mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT C.RESERVE_NO --예약번호 , B.SPACE_TITLE --공간장소 , A.REVIEW_CONT --리뷰내용 , A.RATING --평점 , TO_CHAR(A.REVIEW_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REVIEW_ENROLL_DATE --작성일자 FROM REVIEW A INNER JOIN SPACE B ON A.SPACE_NO = B.SPACE_NO INNER JOIN RESERVE C ON B.SPACE_NO = C.SPACE_NO WHERE A.MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
